entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm and freezing rain. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
